siteMetadata.title: Victory in Jesus
siteMetadata.subtitle: We can have victory because Our Lord and Savior conquered Sin and Death!

frontmatter.title: Joy in a divided world
frontmatter.description: Joy is not dependent on outward things.  Joy comes from inward things when you have rest in your soul. Joy comes from having one mind. A mind that is like Jesus Christ.  in control. This passage give us the blueprint on how to remain joyous

frontmatter.title: Joy in any Circumstance
frontmatter.description: Sometimes it may be hard to remain joyous under intense situations like what we are going through with the Corona Virus. However, it's important to remember that God is in control. This passage give us the blueprint on how to remain joyous

frontmatter.title: Happiness is a Choice
frontmatter.description: Would you believe me if I told you that happiness is a choice? I strongly believe this is true and here is why
